00043     void ScoringModel::read(std::istream & input)
00044       {
00045         if (!input)
00046           {
00047             throw bpp::IOException ("ScoringModel::ScoringModel: fail to open file");
00048           }
00049 
00050         string temp;
00051         string type;
00052 
00053         double gapStart = 0;
00054         double gapExtend = 0;
00055         double match = 0;
00056         double missmatch = 0;
00057         double negativeMatch = 0;
00058 
00059         double maxValue = 1;
00060 
00061         uint Size = 1;
00062 
00063         ModelValues::iterator it;
00064 
00065         // Main loop : for all file lines
00066         while (!input.eof())
00067           {
00068             it = model.begin();
00069             getline(input, temp, '\n'); // Copy current line in temporary string
00070 
00071             if (temp[0] != '#')
00072               {
00073                 istringstream istring(temp);
00074                 istring >> type >> gapStart >> gapExtend >> match
00075                     >> negativeMatch >> missmatch;
00076                 istring >> temp; //Cut out the ":" char
00077 
00078                 if (match > maxValue)
00079                   maxValue = match;
00080 
00081                 if (negativeMatch > maxValue)
00082                   maxValue = negativeMatch;
00083 
00084                 while (istring)
00085                   {
00086                     AlignmentSymbol sc;
00087                     istring >> temp;
00088                     if (!temp.empty())
00089                       {
00090                         sc.symbol = bpp::TextTools::toUpper(temp);
00091                         if (sc.symbol.length() > Size)
00092                           Size = sc.symbol.length();
00093                         sc.type = type;
00094                         //Changed gapOpen & gapExtend to negative Values to correspond with Maximize
00095                         sc.gapOpen = -gapStart;
00096                         sc.gapExtend = -gapExtend;
00097                         sc.match = match;
00098                         sc.negativeMatch = negativeMatch;
00099                         sc.missmatch = -missmatch;
00100 
00101                         model.insert(it, pair<const std::string,
00102                             AlignmentSymbol>(sc.symbol, sc));
00103                         it++;
00104                         //Also add negative Symbol Version
00105                         sc.symbol = "-" + sc.symbol;
00106                         model.insert(it, pair<const std::string,
00107                             AlignmentSymbol>(sc.symbol, sc));
00108                         it++;
00109                       }
00110                   }
00111 
00112               }
00113           }
00114         NormalizeScores(maxValue);
00115 
00116       }
00117 
00118     void ScoringModel::read(const std::string &path)
00119       {
00120         ifstream input(path.c_str(), ios::in);
00121         read(input);
00122         input.close();
00123       }

00125     double ScoringModel::ScoreOf(const std::string &A, const std::string &B) const
00126       {
00127 
00128         double outA = 0;
00129         double outB = 0;
00130 
00131         //Check if two symbols are completly identical
00132         if (A.compare(B) == 0)
00133           {
00134             ModelValues::const_iterator foo = model.find(A);
00135             return foo->second.match;
00136           }
00137         else
00138         //Check for negative values
00139         if ((A.compare("-"+B) == 0) || (B.compare("-"+A) == 0))
00140           {
00141             ModelValues::const_iterator foo = model.find(A);
00142             return foo->second.negativeMatch;
00143           }
00144         else
00145           {
00146             ModelValues::const_iterator foo = model.find(A);
00147             outA = foo->second.missmatch;
00148             foo = model.find(B);
00149             outB = foo->second.missmatch;
00150             //Check wich one is worse
00151             if (BestOfTwo(outA, outB) != outA)
00152               return outA;
00153             else
00154               return outB;
00155           }
00156       }
00157 
00158     double ScoringModel::ScoreOfGapOpen(const std::string A) const
00159       {
00160         ModelValues::const_iterator foo = model.find(A);
00161         return foo->second.gapOpen;
00162       }
00163     double ScoringModel::ScoreOfGapExtend(const std::string A) const
00164       {
00165         ModelValues::const_iterator foo = model.find(A);
00166         return foo->second.gapExtend;
00167       }
00168     int ScoringModel::GetModelSize(void) const
00169       {
00170         return model.size();
00171       }
00172 
00173     double ScoringModel::BestOfTwo(const double A, const double B) const
00174       {
00175 
00176         return std::max(A, B);
00177       }
00178 
00179     double ScoringModel::BestOfThree(const double A, const double B,
00180         const double C) const
00181       {
00182 
00183         return BestOfTwo(A, BestOfTwo(B, C) );
00184 
00185       }

00197     ModelValues::iterator ScoringModel::itStart(void)

00201     ModelValues::iterator ScoringModel::itEnd(void)
00202       {

00205 
00206     void ScoringModel::NormalizeScores(const double &maxValue)
00207       {
00208         for (ModelValues::iterator foo = itStart(); foo != itEnd(); foo++)
00209           {
00210             foo->second.match /= maxValue;            
00211             foo->second.negativeMatch /= maxValue;
00212                         
00213           }
00214       }
00215   }
